short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searches http://shop.edxelectronics.com for the highlighted part number

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search EDX Electronics online store for any electronic component, from any webpage, with the simple click of your mouse!  Simply highlight any part number, right-click your mouse, and select the option to "Search EDX".  You'll immediately see the results from the EDX online store in your browser.  Sourcing electronic components has never been easier with this extension.
